Agora Vote CONTINUE WITH FACEBOOK LOG IN Sign Up Agora Logo User Name Password Login User Login User Sign Up First Name Last Name Email Address Already Have An Account ? Sign In Forgot Password ? Profile Dashboard Communicate Report a bug Share with others About Agora My Invitations Contact Us Agora vote is a voting platform where users can create elections and invite friends to cast their votes. It supports a wide range of voting algorithms some of which are Majority, Egalitarian, Australian STV just to name a few Feel free to contact us on our Gitter channels and work with us on Gitlab AOSSIE\'s GITTER AOSSIE\'s GITLAB Feel free to raise an issue so that our team can improve that as fast as possible Change Password New Password Confirm New Password Create Election Active \n Elections Pending \nElections Total \n Elections Finished \n Elections Invite Voters? Get real time results? How secret are ballots? Who can see the list of voters? Only me Everyone with access to election Some More Options Next Add Candidate Name of Candidate Enter Candidate\'s Name Election Description Election Name Election Method Start Date End Date datePicker Select Voting Algorithm Baldwin ExhaustiveBallot Logout testemail 0 user email id Send Link Verify Developed with ❤ by AOSSIE Please enter user name to receive password reset link Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco labor Candidates Candidates Name START: Starting Date STATUS: Election Status END: Ending Date Image Button Description Active Elections Finished Elections Pending Elections Total Elections Share with others to make open source a more beautiful place Delete election Invite Voters Voters Ballot Result Ballots Vote Ballot Voter Name Voter Email Email of the Voter Name of the Voter Add Voter Swipe to delete Voter Swipe to delete Candidate Enter Details of Voters Winner Name Please Write Your Answer Here Security Question Welcome, %1$s! Link Sent, Please Check Your Emails Invalid Username Something Went Wrong. "You have been invited to vote for an election" Election Visibility Voter List Visibility Create elections and invite user to vote Enter a name for your election Choose a method for your election Enter a description for your election Enter all candidates for your election Import Candidates Import candidates\nfrom excel sheet Choose who can view your election Select to make voter list public Pick the start date for your election Pick the end date for your election Real Time Invite This shows the live\nstatus of the election Delete Election can\'t be deleted when active Voters can\'t be invited when election is finished View voters for the election View ballot for the election View the result of the election Skip Something went wrong.
